name: Peppa's Mansion 3
description:
This is Probably the most Craziest PPGG Game I Made!

                                      STORY

Peppa had a call from an unknown phone call by someone and met them in the woods! It WAS SUZY?!

But suzy wanted to help peppa with her vacuum issue suzy gave peppa a special weapon to  stop daddy pig from grinding her!

                               CONTROLS!

Use the left and right keys to Move

Press To up Button to Jump!

Press M to Blast Light BLASTER!

Press the down key to dash (You can buy dash from the shop)

Press X to Duck!

Press P to Pause the Game!

Or Press L to unpause the game

Press H for suzy to help you

Press V to Use Bomb Attack!

                                  

                     MORE TO DISCOVER!!

There is Gallery were you see the characters that you see!

There is Help free information for more help from suzy.

There is a settings there isn't any much there but yea.
